description:
a: One red felt box with gabled roof held up by two white hands and two white feet on each bottom corner. Interior of box has two white heads on opposite sides (top and bottom) with red string from one mouth into the other. 

b,c: Two red felt boxes, each with gabled roof held up by two hands and two feet on each bottom corner. Interior of each box has rows on white plaster fingers. 

d: One red felt box with gabled roof mounted to wall held up by two white hands on front bottom corners. Interior of box has a tangle of black insulation tubing covered by black felt.
medium: Wood, fabric, plaster, resin, cedar mulch, insulation tubing and thread
title: Portrait for Yudishtir
